scripts.clean: rm dist/* && rm examples/js/bundle* && rm examples/js/ImagesLazyLoading.min.js
scripts.dist: browserify standalone.js -o dist/ImagesLazyLoading.js && browserify standalone.js | uglifyjs > dist/ImagesLazyLoading.min.js
scripts.build_examples: npm run dist && npm run build_example1 && npm run build_example2 && npm run build_example3
